SELECT ORD_NO AS ordNo , USR_ID AS usrId , ENTR_NO AS entrNo , ORD_STAT AS ordStat , ORDR_ID AS ordrId , ORDR_NM AS ordrNm , ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon , ORDR_EMAIL AS ordrEmail , ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon , ACQR_NM AS acqrNm , ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr , ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl , ACQR_EMAIL AS acqrEmail , PRCL_WAY AS prclWay , PACK_WAY AS packWay , PAY_WAY AS payWay , PAY_MNY AS payMny , REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo , ORD_DATE AS ordDate , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , RGST_ID AS rgstId , BILL_NUM AS billNum , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd FROM CLT_ORD_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo}

SELECT ORD_DTL_NO AS ordDtlNo , USR_ID AS usrId , ORD_NO AS ordNo , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , RGST_ID AS rgstId FROM CLT_ORD_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo}

SELECT DTL.ORD_DTL_NO AS ordDtlNo , DTL.USR_ID AS usrId , DTL.ORD_NO AS ordNo , DTL.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , DTL.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , DTL.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , DTL.UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , DTL.UPDT_ID AS updtId , DTL.RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , DTL.RGST_ID AS rgstId , SALE.BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOOD.IMG_PATH AS imgPath , GOOD.IMG_NM AS imgNm , GOOD.DLV_PRC AS dlvPrc FROM CLT_ORD_DTL DTL INNER JOIN CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE ON SALE.GOODS_CD = DTL.GOODS_CD INNER JOIN CLT_GOODS_INFO GOOD ON GOOD.GOODS_CD = DTL.GOODS_CD WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_DTL_NO = #{ordDtlNo}

SELECT ORD_DTL_NO AS ordDtlNo , USR_ID AS usrId , ORD_NO AS ordNo , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate , UPDT_ID AS updtId , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , RGST_ID AS rgstId FROM CLT_ORD_DTL WHERE 1=1

SELECT ORD.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc , GOODS.ENTR_NO AS entrNo , GOODS.GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd , GOODS.DLV_PRC AS dlvPrc FROM CLT_ORD_BASKET ORD , CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE , CLT_GOODS_INFO GOODS WHERE 1=1 AND ORD.SALE_BOARD_SEQ = SALE.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AND ORD.GOODS_CD = GOODS.GOODS_CD AND ORD.ORD_BASKET_SEQ = ${ordBasketSeq}

SELECT BSKT.ORD_BASKET_SEQ AS ordBasketSeq , BSKT.USR_ID AS usrId , BSKT.GOODS_QTY AS goodsQty , BSKT.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AS saleBoardSeq /*판매게시판시퀀스*/ , GODS.IMG_PATH AS imgPath /*상품이미지경로*/ , GODS.IMG_NM AS imgNm /*상품이미지이름*/ , SALE.BUL_TIT_NM AS bulTitNm /*제목*/ , SALE.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd /*상품 코드*/ , SALE.ENTR_NO AS entrNo /*거래처 번호*/ , SALE.GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc /*상품 가격*/ , SALE.GOODS_SALE_PRC AS goodsSalePrc /*상품 할인 가격*/ , SALE.SALE_CNT AS saleCnt /*판매 수량*/ , SALE.SALE_STAT_CD AS saleStatCd /*판매 상태 코드*/ , SALE.DESCRIPTION AS description /*설명*/ FROM CLT_ORD_BASKET BSKT , CLT_GOODS_INFO GODS , CLT_SALE_BOARD SALE WHERE 1=1 AND BSKT.GOODS_CD = GODS.GOODS_CD AND BSKT.SALE_BOARD_SEQ = SALE.SALE_BOARD_SEQ AND BSKT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BSKT.USR_ID = #{usrId}
